data.title: Intimate live music venue
data.text: I saw Cndlebox at Honey. It was a very intimate venue and we loved it. The acoustics are great. The bartenders were awesome. They saw my beer was getting low and had another ready for me. Loved it!

data.title: everything nice except the price
data.text: nice place, good commercial music. The only problem is the price: 11$ to enter + 7$ a beer...too much.

data.title: a young happening place with good music and ALCOHOL!
data.text:
Went there for a fundraiser...it was loud and happening!...at my age, I'm over the 
"scene".....It's a place to see and be seen too...

data.title: Nice place for a reunion
data.text: We had our 20th high school reunion here, and it was nice and pretty. Pretty picey for food and drinks though. But still had fun with old friends :)

data.title: Great night out
data.text: It was a while since I visited this spot, last time it was deluxe. DJ was great and drinks were good. Nice atmosphere. A little different from what i am used to but it was a good different. Place closes down at 2AM if I am not mistaken. Half is inside and the other half is open roof if I remember correctly lol. Nice spot overall.

data.title: This is fun and worth a stop for a drink.
data.text: The drinks are good, the DJ is good, and the food comes from 32 East, so that is excellent.  This is a great place for a drink after dinner or a quick drink and a bite to eat.  However, a lot of the lounge area is reserved after about 9:00pm, so go earlier or plan to just sit at the bar.

data.title: Best Nightlife in Delray
data.text: Honey is my new favorite spot in Delray. With a beautiful new interior and outside patios, it's a great place to party with friends. The music choice is great but not too loud so you can still chat with your friends. The specialty cocktail list is killer and the drink service is fast even when there is a packed house!

data.title: Great night!
data.text: They are open Wednesday through Saturday, and I have been there both on the weekend and during the week. Awesome! I didn't realize their happy hour lasted until 9pm (1/2 off drinks) AND they let you order food from 32 East next door off of a special menu! They have great music (awesome DJs), and also have fun monthly events! Their Facebook page is where I found out about that so definitely check there if you are looking for somwthing to do downtown!

data.title: LOVE IT!
data.text: Best Lounge in Delray. Love the environment, very classy, great service and good music. The staff is awesome, nice and attentive. I always have a fun time here. Highly recommended

data.title: Awesome venue
data.text: Honey is in the middle of downtown Delray (The ave). Venue is awesome and music is fun. Good Food from 32 East and overall an awesome location for a night out. Definitely recommend!

data.title: Best Place to get drinks and dance in Delray Beach
data.text:
This is the best place to get drinks and dance in Delray Beach.

Great atmosphere.  Easy valet parking. Very friendly staff. Cool art work. Great patio on the back. Just love the design and environment.

data.title: Great vibes!
data.text: I've been here many times and will definitely come back. The music is awesome, outdoor patio is different and very chill! And all the bartenders are super friendly! Great place to hang out on the ave.

data.title: Great place
data.text: good music, great drinks- Definitely going back for my birthday next month. My friends had a lot of fun there for sure

data.title: Great spot on the Ave
data.text: If you're looking for a place to have a great time, to find great & friendly people, reasonable prices and great music then HONEY is the place to check out

data.title: THE BEST SPOT ON THE AVE.
data.text: THIS PLACE IS AMAZIINNGGGG!!!!!! great service, great music , and a very friendly staff. I always go to honey when I'm at that side of town. Great drink prices as well. I love the fact that it attracts a well mixed type of crowd and  you can truly just enjoy a night out !! If your a tourist this has to be added to your must go places , you wont regret it !!!

data.title: Awesome Spot!!!
data.text: Love this spot!!!  Very fun atmosphere. The staff is always top notch when it comes to customer service even when they are busy. Great night club!!

data.title: Best place in Delray
data.text: Great atmosphere, the staff is very friendly and the music rocks!!! I highly recommend it if you are looking to have a great night out!

data.title: Awesome Place for a night out!
data.text: Great place to distract your mind! The bartenders are great, the music is always good, and the drinks are awesome! Always a good time on a Friday or Saturday night!

data.title: GREAT
data.text: Great vibe, great atmosphere, great drinks. Service was really great and the music was on point. I would definitely recommend this place to any out-of-townies looking for a good time.

data.title: That went downhill fast!
data.text:
We liked this place when it first opened.  We liked that you could get a decent glass of wine, the decor is nice and there are open areas in the front and the back.  It also has a pretty diverse crowd, which is great.  Not just a bunch of teeny bopper types.  

What's killed this place for us is the DJ.  The last couple of times we've gone here, the music just stinks!  Forget trying to enjoy a song and maybe dance a bit.  the DJ is just way too cool for that.  His whole check out my mad mixxxxxy skills is just annoying and self-indulgent and a major turn off.  Try requesting an actual SONG and he nods yeah sure, but it never happens.  Anyway, I don't think we'll be going back.  The previous time it was like this, I spoke not only to him but also our really nice server but this past time, more of the same.  Boring!  try entertaining your audience that's out to have a good time and party and dance and laugh instead of over-mixing this that and the other thing and just making the whole vibe generally all chopped up and all about the DJ him.....

Also, totally not a big deal, but after a certain hour, they have a bathroom attendant, which takes up alot of space in the not so huge ladies room and I also wind up feeling terrible if I happen to not have cash with me.  I often dont carry cash anymore.

owner_response.author: David R, Owner at Honey, responded to this review
owner_response.text: Hi there. David here from Honey. We're very sorry that you had an unpleasant experience and we apologize for the late response. We would really love the opportunity to have you back, so that we could perhaps give you a more enjoyable experience. Whatever I can do, don't hesitate to let me know. I can be reached at david@honeydelray.com or by text at 561-889-7801.
owner_response.title: Owner Response
